remarks: Lemma for ~ domtriom .  This is the equinumerosity version of the algebraic identity ` sum_ k e. n ( 2 ^ k ) = ( 2 ^ n ) - 1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Feb-2013.)
statement:
pwsdompw $p |- ( ( n e. _om /\ A. k e. suc n ( B ` k ) ~~ ~P k ) -> U_ k e. n ( B ` k ) ~< ( B ` n ) ) $.
$d B k n $.
